TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditorZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase

summary.span: 用作 Web 部件控件集内的主控件，用于在网页中承载 控件。

span.span: Serves as the primary control in the Web Parts control set for hosting controls on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件集，在区域是适用于在网页上的定义的区域，包含服务器控件的复合控件。Within the Web Parts control set, a zone is a composite control that covers a defined region on a Web page and contains server controls. 区域的主要功能是它包含控件进行布局，并为这些控件提供常见的用户界面 (UI)。The primary functions of a zone are to lay out the controls it contains, and to provide a common user interface (UI) for those controls. 有关区域和 Web 部件应用程序中如何使用它们的常规信息，请参阅基的参考文档类，和[Web 部件控件集概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff0149e4-695a-401a-8cda-53df6d7d2668)。For general information about zones and how they are used in Web Parts applications, see the reference documentation for the base class, and [Web Parts Control Set Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff0149e4-695a-401a-8cda-53df6d7d2668). 控件是一个 Web 部件控件集内的基础控件。The control is one of the fundamental controls in the Web Parts control set. Web 部件的一项重要功能是能够最终用户修改 （或个性化） 网页根据他们的首选项，并保存其个性化设置供将来的浏览器会话。A key feature of Web Parts is the ability of end users to modify (or personalize) Web pages according to their preferences, and save their personalized settings for future browser sessions. 修改 Web 部件页的一个方面包括; 用户可以编辑用户可以编辑的外观、 布局、 行为和其他属性的可见控件。One aspect of modifying Web Parts pages includes editing; users can edit the appearance, layout, behavior, and other properties of the visible controls. Web 部件控件集内的多个控件提供编辑功能，包括控件。Several controls in the Web Parts control set provide the editing features, including the control. 控件变为可见的当 Web 部件页进入编辑模式，且可提供各种可以用于自定义控件控件。An control becomes visible when a Web Parts page enters edit mode, and it makes available various controls that can be used to personalize controls. 控件是非常类似于其父代、类，一个主要区别：控件提供了一个区域模板，在中引用其属性。The control is very similar to its parent, the class, with one key difference: The control provides a zone template, referenced in its property. 区域模板添加了声明中的页持久性格式的内容的功能。The zone template adds the ability to declare content in the page persistence format. 页开发人员可以将放置控制的声明性 Web 网页、 标记中添加子``元素，并在``元素中，添加对的声明性引用控件。Page developers can place an control in the declarative markup of a Web page, add a child `` element, and within the `` element, add declarative references to controls. 控件还具有一种方法， ，这会重写中的基方法类。The control also has a method, , which overrides a base method in the class. 此方法是必需的以便控制可以创建区域模板将包含任何以声明方式添加到的区域的控件。This method is necessary so that an control can create the zone template to contain any controls that are added to the zone declaratively. > [!NOTE] > 中的按钮UI 需要客户端脚本才能正常工作。The buttons in the UI require client-side scripting in order to work correctly. 如果浏览器中禁用了脚本，用户将无法执行操作通过UI。If scripting is disabled in the browser, the user will not be able to perform actions through the UI. ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，对于此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准，如 Web 内容辅助功能准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级别 1 准则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 对于此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示几个声明性和以编程方式使用类。The following code example demonstrates several declarative and programmatic uses of the class. 该示例创建一个继承自的自定义编辑器区域类，并在 Web 部件页中使用它。The example creates a custom editor zone that inherits from the class, and uses it in a Web Parts page. 代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 使你能够更改用户控件在网页上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - 引用自定义网页控件。A Web page that references the custom control. - 该示例的工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works. 此代码示例的第一部分是使用户能够更改在网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关更多详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/CS/displaymodecs.ascx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/VB/displaymodevb.ascx#4)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分是一个网页。The second part of the code example is a Web page. 页面顶部附近是`Register`指令用户控件。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive for the user control. 用户控件标记声明中包含的页面`uc1:`元素的前缀。The user control tag is declared in the page with a `uc1:` prefix for the element. 请注意，下面的``元素是``包含多个元素控件，使用某些标记和设置属性，以确定其外观和行为。Notice that below the `` element is an `` element that contains several controls, with some tags and properties set to determine its appearance and behavior. 也有多种方法访问的不同成员以编程方式控制。There are also a number of methods that access various members of the control programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/CS/editorzonecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/VB/editorzonevb.aspx#1)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**编辑模式**要切换到编辑模式下的下拉列表中。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list to switch to edit mode. 若要显示编辑 UI，你可以在这两个控件之一的标题栏中单击谓词菜单 （向下箭头），然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。To display the editing UI, you can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one of the two controls, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑用户界面可见时，你可以看到的声明性和以编程方式使用的效果类成员。With the editing UI visible, you can see the effects of the declarative and programmatic uses of the class members.

para.span: 如果你想要创建自定义区域以获得更好地控制的呈现编辑 UI，可以直接从继承类，只要不需要提供页开发人员将添加的区域模板支持以声明方式控制到你的时区。

span.span: If you want to create a custom zone to gain greater control over the rendering of the editing UI, you can inherit directly from the class, as long as you do not need to provide zone template support for page developers to add controls to your zone declaratively.

para.span: 在这种情况下，你将添加所有以编程方式控制的区域。

span.span: In such a case, you would add all controls to a zone programmatically.

para.span: 如果你想要提供区域模板支持，你应继承自类。

span.span: If you want to provide zone template support, you should inherit from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection CreateEditorParts() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateEditorParts () As EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 创建以页持久性格式在区域模板中声明的所有 控件。

span.span: Creates all the controls declared within a zone template in page persistence format.

returns.span: 一个 ，它包含对区域模板中声明的所有 控件的引用。

span.span: An that contains references to all the controls declared within the zone template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重写基方法，以创建仅区域模板中声明的控件。The method overrides the base method to create only the controls that are declared within the zone template. 任何其他必须以编程方式添加控件添加到的区域。Any other controls added to the zone must be added programmatically. 进行这种，例如，通过实现接口中控件。This can be done, for example, by implementing the interface in a control. 然后，在重写方法，你可以添加自定义集合到区域的控件。Then, in the overridden method, you can add a collection of custom controls to a zone.

exception.span: 当前的 控件没有 ID。

span.span: The current control does not have an ID.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.ITemplate ZoneTemplate { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property ZoneTemplate As ITemplate
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ ZoneTemplate { System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ value); };

summary.span: 提供模板来以页持久性格式包含 控件中的子控件。

span.span: Provides a template to contain child controls within an control in page persistence format.

value.span: 一个 区域模板，作为区域中子控件的容器。

span.span: An zone template that acts as a container for child controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性之间的主要区别是类和基类。The property is the key difference between the class and the base class. 通过添加区域模板，对支持类使页开发人员可以将子内控制声明性 Web 页的标记中的控件。By adding support for a zone template, the class enables page developers to place child controls within an control in the declarative markup of a Web page. 区域模板充当子控件的容器。The zone template acts as a container for the child controls. > [!NOTE] > Set 访问器属性调用方法，这会强制的集合重新创建模板中声明的控件。The set accessor for the property calls the method, which forces the collection of controls declared in the template to be recreated. 这会使模板能够识别的内容的任何更改。This causes any changes in the contents of the template to be recognized. 若要以声明方式中使用的区域模板控件，你可以添加一对``标记和引用标记之间的控件。To use a zone template declaratively within an control, you add a pair of `` tags, and reference controls between the tags. 只有一个区域模板呈现的每个实例控件 (因此，没有无需添加多个``元素与控件)。Only one zone template is rendered per instance of an control (therefore, there is no reason to add multiple `` elements to an control). 此外，区域模板的控件可以包含派生自的部件控件类。Also, the zone template of an control can contain only part controls that derive from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative use of the property. 在示例部分中找到有关该示例的完整代码类概述。The full code for the example is found in the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例演示如何可以将控件放在``中的元素控件。The code example demonstrates how controls can be placed within a `` element in an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/CS/editorzonecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/VB/editorzonevb.aspx#2)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**编辑模式**要切换到编辑模式下的下拉列表中。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list to switch to edit mode. 若要显示的编辑的用户界面 (UI)，可以在这两个控件之一的标题栏中单击谓词菜单 （向下箭头），并单击**编辑**编辑该控件。To display the editing user interface (UI), you can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one of the two controls, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑用户界面可见时，你可以看到的几个中声明的控件``元素。With the editing UI visible, you can see the several controls that are declared within the `` element.
